definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: An early reply would help us to help you.
sentences.chinese: 早速回函将有助于本公司服务贵方。

sentences.english: This is a strictly confidential re oe to a request made by the firm.
sentences.chinese: 这是对该公司的要求严格保密的回函。

sentences.english: Please fill in following fields then click the submit button , we will send your replying form to your E-mail box .
sentences.chinese: 系统会将您的报名回函寄发到您的电子邮件信箱。

sentences.english: If you agree with these corrections, please let us know.
sentences.chinese: 如果您同意这样的修改，请回函告知。

sentences.english: We are writing with reference to your letter of October 21, 1998.
sentences.chinese: 以下是就您1998年10月21日来信的回函。

sentences.english: This is a strictly confidential response to a request made by the firm.
sentences.chinese: 这是对该公司的要求严酷失密的回函。

definition: incoming letter/letter from afar/same as 来信
to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
to submit (a report etc)/to refer (a problem) to sb
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
